在左侧导航栏添加链接信息

./.title: Introduction
./.body:
Introduction立项Introduction
立项
查看在线演示
# 初始化项目
#使用之前确保已安装node 
# npm i  gitbook -g 或 cnpm i gitbook -g // 全局安装gitbook 
# gitbook -V //查看版本 

git clone https://github.com/emjio/gitbook-start.git

cd gitbook-start

# 安装依赖
gitbook install 

# 开发时构建
gitbook serve 
浏览器打开 http://localhost:4000/ 预览

# 打包构建
gitbook build

basic/basic.html.title: 基础用法
basic/basic.html.body:
基本配置titleauthordescriptionlanguagegitbookstylesstructurelinkspluginspluginsConfig基本配置
title
本书标题
author
本书作者
description
本书描述
language
本书语言，中文设置 "zh-hans" 即可
gitbook
指定使用的 GitBook 版本
styles
自定义页面样式
structure
指定 Readme、Summary、Glossary 和 Languages 对应的文件名
links
在左侧导航栏添加链接信息
plugins
配置使用的插件
pluginsConfig
配置插件的属性
{
    "title": "gitbook-start", 
    "author": "emjio",
    "description": "select * from learn",
    "language": "zh-hans",
    "gitbook": "3.2.3",
    "styles": {
        "website": "./styles/website.css"
    },
    "structure": {
        "readme": "README.md"                           //本书简介
    },
    "links": {
        "sidebar": {
            "我的开源": "https://github.com/emjio" //配置更多链接
        }
    },
    "plugins": [
        "-sharing",
        "splitter",
        "expandable-chapters-small",
        "anchors",
        "github",
        "github-buttons",
        "donate",
        "sharing-plus",
        "anchor-navigation-ex",
        "favicon"
    ],
    "pluginsConfig": {
        "github": {
            "url": "https://github.com/emjio"
        },
        "github-buttons": {   
            "buttons": [{
                "user": "emjio",
                "repo": "gitbook-start",
                "type": "star",
                "size": "small",
                "count": true
                }
            ]
        },
        "donate": {
            "alipay": "./source/images/donate.png",
            "title": "",
            "button": "赞赏",
            "alipayText": " "
        },
        "sharing": {
            "douban": false,
            "facebook": false,
            "google": false,
            "hatenaBookmark": false,
            "instapaper": false,
            "line": false,
            "linkedin": false,
            "messenger": false,
            "pocket": false,
            "qq": false,
            "qzone": false,
            "stumbleupon": false,
            "twitter": false,
            "viber": false,
            "vk": false,
            "weibo": false,
            "whatsapp": false,
            "all": [
                "google", "facebook", "weibo", "twitter",
                "qq", "qzone", "linkedin", "pocket"
            ]
        },
        "anchor-navigation-ex": {
            "showLevel": false
        },
        "favicon":{
            "shortcut": "./source/images/favicon.jpg",
            "bookmark": "./source/images/favicon.jpg",
            "appleTouch": "./source/images/apple-touch-icon.jpg",
            "appleTouchMore": {
                "120x120": "./source/images/apple-touch-icon.jpg",
                "180x180": "./source/images/apple-touch-icon.jpg"
            }
        }
    }
}

basic/common.html.title: 目录
basic/common.html.body:
创建页面按照缩进格式配置 即可自动新建页面即可自动生成如图所示结构保存之后记得重新   gitbook serve创建页面
按照缩进格式配置 即可自动新建页面
* [Introduction](README.md)
* [基础用法](basic/basic.md)
    * [目录](basic/common.md)
    * [基本配置](basic/use.md)
* [插件简介](plugin/plugin.md)
    * [目录](plugin/common.md)
    * [基本配置](plugin/more.md)

即可自动生成如图所示结构
 
保存之后记得重新   gitbook serve

basic/use.html.title: 基本配置
basic/use.html.body:
IntroductionBuild SetupIntroduction
Build Setup
# 初始化项目
#使用之前确保已安装node 
# npm i  gitbook -g 或 cnpm i gitbook -g // 全局安装gitbook 

git clone https://github.com/emjio/gitbook-start.git

cd gitbook-start

# 安装依赖
gitbook instart 

# 开发时构建
gitbook serve 
浏览器打开 http://localhost:4000/ 预览

# 打包构建
gitbook build
